# Data

## Handle Data
```{r}
releases <- read.csv(
    file.path(DATA_PATH, "20_releases.csv")
)

releases <- releases %>%
    mutate(
        cycle_type = case_when(
            rapid_release == "True" ~ "rapid",
            trad_release == "True" ~ "trad",
            TRUE ~ "other"))
```

## Summary
```{r}
releases %>% count()

releases %>%
    summarize(sum(commits))

releases %>%
    group_by(cycle_type) %>%
    summarise(
        releases = n(),
        commits = sum(commits))

```
